meanings.definition: Occurring or existing after a holocaust.
meanings.sent1: The postholocaust world was focused on rebuilding and healing.
meanings.sent2: The survivors worked together to create a postholocaust society.
meanings.sent3: After the postholocaust period, new hope emerged from the ashes.
meanings.sent4: The postholocaust era symbolized resilience and renewal.
meanings.sent5: The postholocaust landscape was forever changed by the tragedy.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period following a holocaust.
meanings.sent1: The postholocaust generation learned from the mistakes of the past.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the postholocaust literature to understand its impact.
meanings.sent3: In the postholocaust era, communities came together to support each other.
meanings.sent4: The postholocaust narrative highlighted the importance of unity.
meanings.sent5: The postholocaust art reflected the resilience of the human spirit.
